body:

name: Release 2.1.0
body:
https://github.com/dubreuia/intellij-plugin-save-actions/milestone/14

-  Update copyrigth and license #194 
-  'Execute an action' not working for Tailwind formatter #331 
-  Fix ESLint Problems for "Run editor action on save" #287

-  Add support for Rider #310

name: Release 2.0.0
body:
-  Discontinue support for 2016.3, merge 2018.3 and 2019.3 support #284 
-  Exception with IntelliJ Ultimate 2019.3 #288 
-  Argument for @NotNull parameter 'action' #292 
-  .idea/saveactions_settings.xml not automatically reloaded #295 
-  Fix non reloading config #297

name: Release 1.4.0
body:
-    Disabled but selected options are being processsed #214
-    Reformat whole file always triggered #217
-    Unable to configure the plugin from an Eclipse .epf file #218

name: Release 1.3.0
body:
-  Save actions does not save file after formatting #39 
-  [Build action] Add update resources on save in debug mode #75 
-  Attempt to modify PSI for non-committed Document #109 
-  Got unexpected exception during formatting PsiJavaFile:Testklasse.java: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Wrong offset: 1655. Should be in range: [0, 1623] #113 
-  Changes to multiple files, then Saving All causes multiple Rebuild tasks #128 
-  IntelliJ complains that "Refactorings should not be started inside write action" #203 
-  Refactor actions (remove async) #207

name: Release 1.2.0
body:
https://github.com/dubreuia/intellij-plugin-save-actions/milestone/5?closed=1

- Exception with IntelliJ IDEA 2018.3 EAP bug #190

name: Release 1.1.0
body:
**Enhancements**

- Run actions manually (enhancement) #169 by @markiewb 

**Bugs**

- The settings panel alignment is off (bug) #129 by @rw00 
- Fix Epf config for #91, #135, #155 and #165 (bug) #178 by @rw00 
- [Java inspection] Add quick fix "tighten access inspection" (enhancement) #135 by @rw00 
- Feature Request: Generate serialVersionUID (enhancement) #165 by @rw00  

**Milestone**

- See https://github.com/dubreuia/intellij-plugin-save-actions/milestone/4?closed=1

name: Release 1.0.0
body:
- #91 "Add quick fix make method static"
- #144 "Add fixtures test"
- #154 "Organize imports -> optimize imports?"
- #155 "Add class qualifier to static member access should only apply to other classes"
- #172 "Use semantics versionning x.y.z"

name: Release 0.26
body:
- Migrate build to gradle #49 
- Migrate build and code to java 8 #49 
- Add RubyMine support (again) #18 
- Add CLion support #18

name: Release 0.25
body:
- Add method and static this qualifier quick fix #138 (thanks @visajkin)
- Fix `@Override` on jdk methods #140 #141 (thanks @krasa)
- Add RubyMine support #18

name: Version 0.24
body:
- Merged #123 : fix reset button, by @markiewb 
- Merged #124 : fix epf settings activation, by @markiewb 
- Merged #125 : add save action activation toggle, by @markiewb

name: Version 0.23
body:
- Add support for Eclipse .epf files (#81 #106) thanks @markiewb 
- Add support for shortcut based save-actions (#63 #112) thanks @edeknede
- Fix Webstorm support (#110)

name: Version 0.21
body:
- Add official support for AndroidStudio
- Correct #103

name: Version 0.20
body: - Correct "Must not modify PSI inside save listener" #53

name: Version 0.19
body:
- Fix for #96: plugin-java.xml is not included in the generated jar and thus the java related component and actions are not activated (thanks @markiewb)
- Added new java quickfix and cleanup documentation

name: Version 0.18
body:
- Split code to make plugin work in other products #18 (tested in PyCharm and PhpStorm)
- Add block for if / for / while inspection #85 (thanks @markiewb)

name: Version 0.16
body: - Correct #53 "Must not modify PSI inside save listener" and #83

name: Version 0.15
body:
- Add option to deactivate if compile error PR #77 by @markiewb for issue #76
- Correct #53 "Must not modify PSI inside save listener"

name: Version 0.14
body:
- Plugin should be enabled for each project separately #10 #68 @markiewb 
- Add support for file inclusions (additional whitelist) #67 @markiewb

name: Version 0.13
body: - Add java quick fix "Add missing @Override annotations"

name: Version 0.12
body: - Fix error when creating new java file (https://github.com/dubreuia/intellij-plugin-save-actions/pull/57)

name: Version 0.11
body: - Correct file path exclusion for different project

name: Version 0.10
body: - Correct multiple projects check not working

name: Version 0.9
body: - Correct compile processor blocks multiple files

name: Version 0.8
body:
- Add "compile" save action
- Remove save action skip on current file
- Correct file focus when two projects are opened

name: Version 0.7
body: - Correct issue #25

name: Version 0.6
body: - Correct issue #23

name: Version 0.5
body:
- Add support inspection feature #9
- Add debug and log info #11
- Correct issue #2 (pull request from contributor krasa)
- Correct issue #4
- Correct issue #13 (pull request from contributor dorkbox)
